text:
引取場所→埼玉県さいたま市岩槻区
引取対応可能な時間帯【月～土曜の10時～17時半(事前約束必要）】
●支払詳細
ヤフー簡単決済
★一般注意事項
●商品の受け取り後は必ず受け取りのご連絡お願いします
●新規の方やマイナス評価の多い方、お取引に時間が掛かっている方はこちらで判断し、
trans:
Pickup Location -> Iwatsuki Ward, Saitama City, Saitama Prefecture
Pickup Hours [Monday to Saturday, 10:00 AM to 5:30 PM (Advance appointment required)]
● Payment Details
Yahoo Easy Payment
★ General Notes
● After receiving the product, please confirm receipt.
● For new users, users with many negative review, or those who have taken too long to complete transactions, we reserve the right to make judgements,
